The website contains supplemental materials and code used to analyze text data in Shin, Park, and Kang (2024). Reproducible materials are also posted at the [Center for Open Science](https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/TMF5A) and [Github](https://github.com/mshin77/Korea-LD-policy).

-   `Supplemental Materials` include Tables S1 to S6, which show education policies and practices for the future education of students with learning disabilities.
-   `Research Process` shows the three rounds of Delphi surveys and the process of topic modeling.
-   `Code` displays all R codes used to preprocess and run topic modeling.

- Shin, M., Park, H., & Kang, E. (2024). Development of education policies and practices for students with learning disabilities in South Korea using Delphi surveys and topic modeling. *Learning Disability Quarterly*. [https://doi.org/10.1177/07319487241280393](https://doi.org/10.1177/07319487241280393)
